授業目的: This course provides students with basic historical and philosophical knowledge of Japanese religious traditions. It also exposes students to contemporary debates on religious issues in Japan.
到達目標: Students will have a basic grasp of essential historical information and analytical concepts necessary for understanding Japanese religion. They will also have a basic understanding of contemporary debates on religion in Japan.

トピック.授業計画1: Each class will comprise the following components depending on the topic: lecture, quiz, and presentation or lecture, discussion and presentation. Students should note that there is either a quiz or presentation every week.
トピック.授業外学習2: There will be required readings every week. Students will be tested on their knowledge of the readings in class or be required to give a presentation on them.

成績評価Grading0: 評価基準等　Grading Criteria etc.
成績評価Grading1: 授業外学修課題／Assignment, homework required outside class (06)
成績評価Grading2: プレゼンテーション・発表／Presentation (07)
成績評価Grading3: 授業への参加度（自発性、積極性、主体性、等）／In-class participation,contribution (09)
